name: CreateCandidateNote
description:
Add a note to a candidate's profile in Ashby.

This tool allows for the creation of a note on a candidate's profile, supporting HTML formatted text. It's useful for recruiters and interviewers to document additional information or insights about a candidate.

parameters.name: candidate_note_data
parameters.description: The JSON object containing note details such as candidateId, note content, sendNotifications flag, isPrivate flag, and createdAt timestamp.

sendNotifications.description: Whether or not users who are subscribed to the candidate should be notified that the note was posted. Default is false.

isPrivate.description: Whether the note should be marked as private. Private notes require "Allow access to non-offer private fields?" API key permission to create and view. Default is false.
